<MethodEndpoint
  method={"delete"}
  path={"/resource-servers/{id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deletes a resource server. Cannot delete if it has resources or actions.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
